channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Pour les soldes, ce casque français avec ses inédits transducteurs à dôme M étouffe 30 % de son prix
item.description: Le Focal Bathys a su se démarquer grâce à des transducteurs à dôme M qui produisent un son clair et puissant. Chez son-vidéo.com, ce casque perd 30 % de son prix et tombe à 566,10 euros.

item.title: Robosen’s $1,400 Soundwave Transformer Is a Sick Robot and Sad Bluetooth Speaker
item.description: The voice-controlled, transforming robot is an objectively cool toy, but a little less than meets the eye in the sound department.

item.title: Phonak Audeo Infinio Ultra Sphere Review: Premium Hearing Aids
item.description: This new prescription hearing aid has a special chip designed to improve hearing in noisy conditions.

item.title: No One Is Quite Sure Why Ice Is Slippery
item.description: A thin, watery layer coating the surface of ice is what makes it slick. Despite a great deal of theorizing over the centuries, though, it isn't entirely clear why that layer forms.

item.title: How to watch Memory of a Killer online and for free
item.description: His mind is slipping, but revenge and family keep him sharp. Here’s how you can watch Memory of a Killer online and from anywhere.

item.title: How Long Should You Cold Plunge? We Asked Experts (2026)
item.description: You don't need to Ernest Shackleton yourself to reap the benefits of cold plunging. A calm, controlled ice bath is key.

item.title: This hidden Wi-Fi speaker feature has blown my mind — here’s why you should demand it in all your audio gear
item.description: This lesser-known feature for wireless speakers is the sound-shaping skill I’ve subconsciously spent years longing for.

item.title: The outstanding Nikon Z5 II was our 'camera of the year 2025' - and it's even better with this record-low price today
item.description: You won't find a better value full-frame camera than the Z5 II right now - and B&H Photo is also throwing in a few free gifts for prospective buyers.

item.title: The Lego Pokémon Line Shows Toys Are Only for Rich Adults Now
item.description: Who cares about kids when adult collectors are willing to pay top dollar?

item.title: Bambu P1S Combo Review: Clean, Fast, 3D Printing
item.description: This is the easiest to use 3D printer I've ever tried.

item.title: Are robot window cleaners any good? I tested one – here's what you need to know before you buy
item.description: If you're thinking of outsourcing your window cleaning to a robot-helper, read this first.

item.title: Do you still need a TV licence? What the BBC’s new free YouTube shows could mean for your £175 bill
item.description: The BBC and YouTube partnership has left a lot of burning questions unanswered, but we've got them for you.

item.title: I reviewed this compact Dolby Atmos soundbar from Klipsch, and it would be a true great if it weren't for this one flaw
item.description: Want a Dolby Atmos soundbar but short on space? This model from Klipsch could be the ideal solution.

item.title: Fonction Netflix, grosse affaire sur les montres connectées et Google Play Store – L’actu tech de la semaine
item.description: Netflix coupe une fonction peu utilisée, avenir incertain pour plein de montres connectées et Google qui veut limiter les installations hors Play Store sur Android. C'est le récap de la semaine.
